_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Sunny skies and iconic skiing in the forecast today.
Be the first to know! Sign up for text alerts to get the most up-to-date mountain information. Download the Ikon Pass App to receive fresh powder alerts, weather updates, parking area alerts, and skier capacity updates!
_inspectorSnowReport.AdditionalText: Be the first to know! Sign up for text alerts to get the most up-to-date mountain information. Download the Ikon Pass App to receive fresh powder alerts, weather updates, parking area alerts, and skier capacity updates!
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Snow Park parking is at capacity today, 2/21. Please park at Deer Valley East Village, or the Richardson Flat Park & Ride, then use Park City Transit to access the resort. For more tips on accessing Deer Valley, visit our Transportation blog.
